title: Must Watch: Shimano’s A Dog’s Tale celebrates the life of the trail dog
content:
Trail rides plus trail dogs. For dog lovers, is there anything better? There have been a number of video edits paying homage to different canine trail heroes, but Shimano’s latest clip is dedicated to all the trail dogs out there. Watch the clip, get inspired, saddle up, grab your pup and head out for a […]

The post Must Watch: Shimano’s A Dog’s Tale celebrates the life of the trail dog appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
